summary: Presenting an AI-powered media processing tool for extracting key insights from audio and video content.

children.summary: Manual summarization of long discussions is inefficient, time-consuming, and frustrating.
AI Power Media Processing tool: AI-powered subtitles for media files, with features like sentiment analysis, name detection, and interactive timestamp navigation.
Accurate speech-to-text conversion, even with background noise or multiple accents.
Search for keywords, jump to important moments, and explore clickable timestamps.
AI-generated summary of key points, eliminating the need to watch or listen to the entire file.
Virtual roadmap of the conversation, making it easier to understand key topics and connections.
Using XJS, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, OpenIS Whisper, PostgreSQL, NeonDB, FFmpeg, VideoGS, and WaveCipherGS for seamless video processing.
Designed for anyone dealing with audio or video content, including corporations, students, legal teams, content creators, and support teams.
Extract key decisions from long meetings, improving productivity and decision-making.
Summarize lectures, study smarter, and improve understanding of course materials.
Believing AI can transform how we process audio and video content, making it more accessible, interactive, and intelligent.
